summary: In a utopian society created at the end of the third world war, a female warrior who has been plucked from the badlands begins to see cracks in this new facade. And what does this community have planned for the rest of humankind?
cast: Ai Kobayashi|Jûrôta Kosugi|Mami Koyama|Miho Yamada|Yuki Matsuoka|Toshiyuki Morikawa|Yuzuru Fujimoto|Takehito Koyasu|Tadahisa Saizen|Emi Shinohara|Hirotake Nagata|Ikuo Nishikawa|Ryûji Nakagi|Takehiro Koyama|Toshihiko Kuwagai|Yoshiyuki Kaneko|Tetsu Inada|Tomoko Kawakami|Fumio Matsuoka|Asumi Miwa|Akimoto Tsubasa|Jessica Straus|Jamieson Price|Carolyn Hennesy|Cindy Robinson|Karen Strassman|Dave Wittenberg|Michael McConnohie|Skip Stellrecht|Doug Stone|William Bassett|Kim Strauss|Michael Sorich|Mike Reynolds|Michael Forest|William Frederick Knight|Deborah Sale Butler|Justin O'Brien|Mary Elizabeth McGlynn|Steve Kramer|David Matranga|Liam O'Brien|Bob Papenbrook|Luci Christian|Allison L. title: Appleseed: The Beginning
